events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter specialized in technical hiring has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the recruitment process.
The initial screening call was successfully completed where we discussed your software engineering background and career goals.
Thank you for your prompt response and positive feedback after the initial screening interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our senior developers to further evaluate your skills.
The technical interview went well; you demonstrated strong coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
An HR interview has been arranged to discuss cultural fit and company values with you.
The HR interview was completed, and you expressed alignment with our company culture and vision.
We have extended you an offer for the Software Engineer role with an attractive compensation package.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
The offer has been formally accepted, and we are excited to welcome you as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun, including setup of development environments and introductory meetings.
The hiring process is now closed with your successful integration into the engineering department.
